The user releases a gust of wind that forms several small tornadoes. Combined with [[Fire Release: Running Fire]] that forms a circle on ground level, this creates a massive flaming hurricane.

[[pl:Fūton: Kamikaze]]
[[pt-br:Estilo Vento: Vento Divino]]
